name: Ni WooCommerce Admin Order Columns
author: anzia

sections.description:
Ni WooCommerce Admin Order Columns

Ni WooCommerce Admin Order Columns displays all sold products or items in the admin order list, offering a convenient way to quickly identify the products or items sold in each order. Eliminating the need to edit the order, this plugin provides an efficient solution to view product details directly from the order list.

Key Features of WooCommerce Admin Order Columns

  • Display Order Item Product and Quantity
  • Show Customer IP Address in Order List
  • Show Order Product Name
  • Show Order Product SKU
  • Include Order Total Tax

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate plugin from admin panel.
  3. GO to woocommerce->Order find “Order Product” columns.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email : support@naziinfotech.com

Can you add custom columns in admin order list?

Yes, we will add the custom columns in admin order list as per requirements.

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.

sections.screenshots: 1. Order admin list show the all product each order.
sections.reviews:
Works well

By inspired888 on August 29, 2021

Very useful. I only needed it for displaying IP address of orders, to make it easier to deal with bot order attacks. Did the job nicely.

Really good, but i could be better

By labd12estudio on June 10, 2021

This plugin is almost exactly what I needed. Too bad I can't customize the columns. I needed a column that would display only the delivery type but the plugin options are very limited

Perfect!

By mercano on April 2, 2021

There are plugins, and plugins that are so on point it makes you wonder why aren't they part of the core. This one of those plugins. Its so simple and good, that it makes you feel like WooCommerce is broken without it. Great job Anzar, thank you for this gem!

It is simple and it WORKS.

By crafter47 on August 20, 2020

It would be great if Anzia could add some additional features like: Language, customer email, just customer country and/or shipping information :-)

Nice and simple

By drucyg on January 30, 2020

Very basic (no settings) but did the job for me. Thank you.

short_description: Ni WooCommerce Admin Order Columns enhances the admin order page by adding columns that display crucial information about the ordered products.
